__e: This woman may want to cut all ties to her dad, but she deserves to know.
She'll cut people off for doing nothing.
You got to cut him loose. Why?
"Better to end it now," "and cut off the limb and let the stump heal."
A couple of months ago, I might have felt sorry for you and let you crawl out, but a lot of things have happened to me since then, and I don't feel the same about you anymore.
I mean, we either try, or we... really have to cut our losses and... I don't think I'm ready to do that.
